head.title: Two Powerful Vacuums That Go Easy on Closet Space

hedline.hl1: Two Powerful Vacuums That Go Easy on Closet Space

abstract.p: Dyson offers two new compact vacuum cleaners that have power of full-size models; photos (S)

block.p: Two new compact Dyson vacuums offer relief from dust and pet hair to anyone who needs a full-size model but does not have the space to store it. The Stowaway ($499.99), left, a canister with as much power as an upright, has a smallish body (11 inches wide by 17.7 inches deep) and a hose with attachments for hardwood and carpet that wraps around the machine when not in use. The Slim ($469.99), right, an upright, works on all types of floors and has a telescoping hose for hard-to-reach jobs. Both are bagless and have HEPA filters. At the Conran Shop, 407 East 59th Street, (866) 755-9079 or conranusa.com.
Good deals and secret sources may be reported to rohrlich@nytimes.com.

The Slim ($469.99), right, an upright, works on all types of floors and has a telescoping hose for hard-to-reach jobs. Both are bagless and have HEPA filters. At the Conran Shop, 407 East 59th Street, (866) 755-9079 or conranusa.com.
